front.title: Criteria for Evaluating VPN Implementation Mechanisms

abstract.t: A variety of mechanisms for implementing Virtual Private Network(VPN) utilizing public IP network infrastructure have been proposedin [1,2,3,4] and more may be emerging. This document attempts toidentify a set of criteria for evaluating such mechanisms. Thecriteria could be used by IETF for evaluating a VPN proposal beforeadvancing it to standard track or by VPN Service Providers orenterprise network administrators for choosing which mechanism to usein order to implement their desired VPN networks. The mechanisms thiscriteria addresses are exclusively for implementing IP based VPNs, asoppose to non-IP based ones, such as Frame Relay based VPNs, etc.
